education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
details: iOS Development: Language basics, SwiftUI, SpriteKit, MVC Pattern
Cloud Development: Cloud Computing, Virtualization, Containerization, and Orchestration
Software Engineering: Object Orientated Design Principles, Refactoring, and Design Patterns
Database Management: Table Design and Normalization, UML Design, Web-based Database System
Computer Systems: Memory hierarchy, Optimizing program performance, Operating Systems and Network functions
Statistics II: Normal Distribution, Hypothesis Testing, Linear Regression Analysis of Variance, Multiple Regression, Categorical Data and Chi-square Analysis and Nonparametric

experience.title: Owner
responsibilities: Established and currently manage a sophisticated e-commerce operation on Amazon, emphasizing high-efficiency product search capabilities and advanced logistics.
Utilize data-driven strategies to continuously refine operational processes, overseeing all aspects from inventory management to customer service, ensuring scalable business growth

My business stands out by efficiently managing the entire supply chain—from pinpointing customer needs through precise search technology to ensuring rapid delivery with state-of-the-art shipping solutions.

experience.title: Information Technology Sector Head
responsibilities: Manages a group of analysts, with weekly meetings and teaching of appropriate topics over a semester.
Utilizing Financial Accounting concepts, Monte Carlo, VAR, Risk Analysis, Stochastic processes, Approximations, and Sentiment Analysis
Using Bloomberg Terminal to create risk models, financial forecasting, and fundamental and technical valuation, to optimize portfolio allocation and performance

experience.title: Office Assistant
responsibilities: Determined the length of time to maintain various documents such as tax returns, human resource records, leases, sale documents, and construction documents.
Implemented this plan based on relevant documents by sorting through documents and reorganizing the files by project and year.

projects.name: iOS Game
projects.description: Designed and developed an engaging iOS game using Swift and SwiftUI, incorporating advanced features such as contact detection and game physics. Utilized SpriteKit to enhance visual effects and gameplay dynamics. Integrated an API to fetch and implement high-quality game images, optimizing the user interface and overall player experience. Demonstrated proficiency in mobile game development, real-time physics simulation, and API integration.

projects.name: Financial Scraping
projects.description: Developed a sophisticated financial data scraping project for the West Chester Investment Group, utilizing APIs to fetch the most recent stock prices and financial ratios. Leveraged Pandas for advanced data manipulation and analysis, and employed NumPy for efficient numerical computations. The project enabled comprehensive fundamental analysis, providing valuable insights for investment decision-making. Demonstrated expertise in API integration, data extraction, and real-time financial analytics.

projects.name: Financial Application
projects.description: Developed and launched a comprehensive financial application on cloud infrastructure, leveraging advanced technologies and methodologies. Implemented robust features using Python and JavaScript, ensured efficient data management with SQL, and optimized deployment through Docker and Kubernetes. Utilized Jenkins for continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD), ensuring seamless updates and scalability. Applied key concepts of virtualization, containerization, and orchestration to enhance performance, security, and reliability.
